repl_description:
An AI-powered dental practice CRM with appointment management and patient chat capabilities. The system provides comprehensive practice management through a modern web interface featuring a responsive homepage with hero section, doctor profiles, features showcase, and testimonials integration. The platform includes dedicated portal access for both doctors and patients with role-based functionality, featuring a streamlined doctor portal with section-based navigation and integrated chat functionality.

Tech Stack:
• Backend: Flask
• Frontend: Vanilla JavaScript, Responsive CSS
• Features: AI integration, appointment management, secure patient chat, dynamic homepage, role-based portal access
• UI Components: Hero section, doctor/patient portals, doctor profiles, feature cards, stat displays, testimonials, color-coded navigation
• Assets: Professional doctor images in static/img directory
